name: WP Config Constants
author: Chris Taylor

sections.description: Shows you the values of constants defined in your wp-config.php file. Useful if you need to quickly check things like the database and debug settings. For security reasons it will obfuscate the DB_PASSWORD constant and all security key and salt constants.
sections.installation: Install from the plugin repository, then activate the plugin and access the admin page in the Settings menu.
sections.faq:
Why did you write this?

Sometimes I need quick and easy access to the information in the wp-config.php file. Other developers may need this as well, so I’m sharing this plugin.

short_description: Shows you the values of constants defined in your wp-config.php file
